ModMetaData.name: VFE Classical Tech Rebalance
ModMetaData.author: Seanbeag
ModMetaData.description:
Changes the tech levels and prerequisites of research projects in Vanilla Factions Expanded Classical to fit in better with Vanilla
Techs changed from Neolithic to Medieval:
Heavy Shield Making, Legionary Armaments, Legionnaire Armor, Centurion Armor, Scorpion, Bronze Working, Tyrian Production, Togas, Temperature Control.
Tech Prerequisites added:
Heavy Shield Making - Requires Smithing Legionary Armaments - Requires Long Blades Legionnaire Armor - Requires Smithing Centurion Armor - Requires Smithing Scorpion - Requires Armor Beacons - Requires Tree Sowing Bronze Working - Requires Smithing Cement Working - Requires Stonecutting Tyrian Production - Requires Devilstrand Road Building - Requires Stonecutting Woodfired Crematorium - Requires Tree Sowing Togas - Requires Complex Clothing Temperature Control - Requires Passive Cooler Mosaics - Requires Stonecutting Thermaebath - Requires Stonecutting Drama and Comedy - Requires Stonecutting
